instructions:
Place vinegar, mustard, honey and salt in small bowl. Whisk in yogurt and oil; stir in poppy seed. Thin with water as needed.
Arrange spinach on platter or individual plates. Compose fruit on top of salad. Drizzle with dressing.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon water, or more if needed, to thin
1 cup peeled sliced fresh DOLE® Tropical Gold® Pineapple
title: Fresh Fruit Salad with Baby Spinach and Yogurt-Poppy Seed Dressing
